top_comments.comment: Ive seen people ask what happens to the alcohol after, but I wanna know how he's getting so much o.o is he getting it in bulk? A private supplier? Tell me your secrets!! Honestly, it seems super expensive and idk how ad revenue could cover it 🤷

comments_since_last_sample.body: Even a glass of this can throw me up, so much mixing and the sugary soda to irritate the alcoholic bowel lol.
